---
pagetitle: "External Partners"
format: 
  html:
    page-layout: full
    toc: false
---

<style>
:root {
  --theme-main: #00883A;
  --theme-bg: #f5f6fa;
  --theme-card-bg: #fff;
  --theme-card-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(43,134,75,0.10);
  --theme-border: #e3e7ed;
}

body {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

.content-container{
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 2rem auto;
  padding: 0 1.5rem;
}


.header-section {
  font-size: 2.6rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color:var(--theme-main);
  margin-bottom: 1.1rem;
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}

.intro-text {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
}

/* styling for logo*/
.logo-img{
  padding:1rem;
  align-content: center;
}
.logo-img img {
  width: 150px;   
  height: auto;   
  object-fit: contain; 
  opacity: 1;
}
.img-forrt img{
  width:110px;
}

.member-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 280px 800px;
  grid-template-rows: auto;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.member-grid-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  background: var(--theme-card-bg);
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-shadow: var(--theme-card-shadow);
  border: 1.5px solid var(--theme-border);
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  transition: transform 0.13s, box-shadow 0.13s;
  height: 350px; 
  min-width: 200px;
  max-width: 320px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.member-grid-item:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.025);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(43,134,75,0.15);
  border-color: var(--theme-main);
}

.profile-link {
  display: contents;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  height: 100%;
}


.member-grid-name {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--bs-gray-700);
  margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
  line-height: 1.4;
  min-height: 2.9em;
  max-height: 4.2em;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.member-socials {
  margin-top: auto;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  padding-top: 1rem;
  padding-bottom: 2rem;
}


.social-link {
  display: inline-flex;         
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.4rem;
  background: none;              
  box-shadow: none;               
  color: var(--theme-main);                 
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;              
  width: auto;                  
  height: auto;                 
  border: 1px solid #e3e7ed;                  
  border-radius: 4px;              
  padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem;                   
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: color 0.2s, border-color 0.2s;
}

.social-link i {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  line-height: 1;      
  margin: 0; 
}

.social-link:hover {
  background-color:rgba(43, 134, 75, 0.98);
  color: white;
  border-color:var(--theme-main);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}



.description-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
}

.description-text {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  max-height: calc(1.2rem * 1.85 * 5);
  width: 100%;
  text-align: justify;
}


hr {
    border: 0;
    height: 2px;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5));
    margin: 20px 0;
    grid-column: 1 / -1; 
  }

</style>

```{=html}

The Network’s goals are to promote open research practices through training and community building, to conduct meta-research, and to work with stakeholders across the sector to ensure coordination of efforts at the national level.

          <div class="profile-link">

              </div>

                  The Center for Reproducible Science and Research Synthesis (CRS) works to advance scientific methods, practices, norms, and incentives that produce trustworthy and reproducible research. Building on this foundation of reproducible science, we develop approaches to systematically integrate reliable evidence across heterogeneous studies and research designs.

          <div class="profile-link">

                  <div class="logo-img">

                  <div class="member-grid-name">Center for Open Science</div>  
                  <div class="member-socials">

                  </div>   
              </div>
          </div>

          <div class="description-container">
              <div class="description-text">
                  The Center for Open Science (COS) was founded in 2013 to start, scale, and sustain open research practices that will democratize access to research, improve inclusion of all stakeholders, enhance accountability to research integrity, facilitate the self-corrective process of science, expand transparency and sharing of all research content, and improve research rigor and reproducibility.
              </div>

  </div>
```
